name: LARRY PITT ASSOCIATES, P.C., and Larry Pitt, Esquire, Petitioners, v. Johnny BUTLER, Sec. Dept. Labor & Industry, and Richard Thompson, Dir. Pennsylvania Bureau of Worker's Compensation, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Larry Pitt Associates, P.C. v. Butler

parties: LARRY PITT ASSOCIATES, P.C., and Larry Pitt, Esquire, Petitioners, v. Johnny BUTLER, Sec. Dept. Labor & Industry, and Richard Thompson, Dir. Pennsylvania Bureau of Worker’s Compensation, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of September, 2002, the Order of the Commonwealth court dated October 30, 2001 is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
LARRY PITT ASSOCIATES, P.C., and Larry Pitt, Esquire, Petitioners, v. Johnny BUTLER, Sec. Dept. Labor & Industry, and Richard Thompson, Dir. Pennsylvania Bureau of Worker’s Compensation, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 5, 2002.
